class.name: VoxelEngine
class.brief_description: Singleton holding common settings and handling voxel processing tasks in background threads.

method.name: get_stats
get_version_major
method.description: Gets the major version number of the voxel engine. For example, in [code]1.2.0[/code], [code]1[/code] is the major version.

method.name: get_version_minor
method.description: Gets the minor version number of the voxel engine. For example, in [code]1.2.0[/code], [code]2[/code] is the minor version.

method.name: get_version_patch
method.description: Gets the patch version number of the voxel engine. For example, in [code]1.2.0[/code], [code]0[/code] is the patch version.
